messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/14/03 10:48:55 PM Eastern Daylight Time, HMSL2@...
writes:

> Friday, June 20th, because Attitash
> Mountain in New Hampshire
> is giving FREE-yes truly FREE- value passes all day for
>
>

Oh I remember going to Attitash as a kid. Was such a treat once a summer, we
had so little money, and it wasn't free at that time. What great memories.
Thanks Pam G


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
